name: Strike II: Return to the Crypt
name_original: Strike II: Return to the Crypt
description:
Sequel to the game Strike: In the Crystal Crypt which was made for Mark Brown's GMTK Gamejam in 2017, Strike II: Return to the Crypt is a fast-paced rogue-lite beat-em-up/shooter.

Unlock new characters and items, collect power-ups and equipment, and attempt to gather gather wishes by defeating the infamous Last King in the depths of the Crypt! But beware, for if your health drops to zero, a greater foe will appear to take your life!

The game was made entirely by Benjamin Maksym (aka Linker) over the course of around two years. The project was developed within Game Maker Studio. Keyboard and mouse controls are recommended, but controller is also supported (though there's no button-remapping for controllers, and it's liable to be buggy, so bear that in mind!)

Feel free to post high-scores in the comments below!
